## hstr variable

Formats given value `x` as Fortran style Hollerith string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hstr: Stringer<any>
```

## Example


```ts
hstr("abc")  // "3Habc"
hstr(123.45) // "6H123.45"
hstr("")     // "0H"
hstr(null)   // ""

```
[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hollerith\_constant](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hollerith_constant)
